text: Hey Everyone. i am new in HubSpot, so it can be, that my question is stupid for many of you...  In HubSpot its possible to create offers. Is it also possible to create a new template with own css, etc.?

You can create CMS pages using HTML CSS JS, and HubL.

If youâ€™re referring to the sales quotes functionality, there is a beta for custom quotes which leverages the CMS functionality.
